short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure auto login to any app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enable SSO for your applications using this simple extension.

- Single Sign On for all applications that you use on a daily basis.
- Store usernames and passwords for seamless login to your applications
- Never forget another password 
- Secure access to all of your applications 
- Enable MFA / 2FA on top of your application login

Stop wasting time getting locked out of accounts or remembering passwords, we simplify application logins while keeping your access secure.
